In this video, I demonstrate five (5) AutoCAD dimension tips and trick, if you will, that I think will help you to work faster in AutoCAD. I covered the following tools: DIMLAYER, DIMSPACE, DIMBREAK, DIM, as well as other things like Fixed Extension Lines, Continuous Dimensions, Stretch Group Dimensions and Baseline Dimensions, etc.

I do hope that you enjoyed this video. 

Subscribe if you did. Or like this video.
